DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
--- Carga en la temporal los diferentes monitores de playvox select distinct de_monitor into #temp_de_monitores from Consultas_DW.dbo.aux_h_info_evaluaciones_playvox order by de_monitor
--- Declara la variable @Max_ID_MONITOR Declare @Max_ID_MONITOR int --set @Max_ID_MONITOR = (0) la variable va en 0 si y solo la tabla esta vacia set @Max_ID_MONITOR = (select MAX(id_monitor) from DW_SALUD.dbo.D_MONITORES)
--- Se genero un ciclo donde la cantidad de registros distintos entre el excel y la tabla d_monitores. --- Existen 2 posibilidades: si es mayor a 0 entra e ingresa info, si es igual a 0 finaliza el ciclo. WHILE (select count(distinct de_monitor )from #temp_de_monitores T where t.de_monitor not in (select d.de_monitor from DW_SALUD.dbo.D_MONITORES D)) > 0 BEGIN insert into DW_SALUD.dbo.D_MONITORES select top 1 (@Max_ID_MONITOR + 1) , t.de_monitor from #temp_de_monitores T where t.de_monitor not in (select d.de_monitor from DW_SALUD.dbo.D_MONITORES D) set @Max_ID_MONITOR = (@Max_ID_MONITOR + 1) END
